headline: Fiber Sale and New CEO Could Be a Game Changer for Crown Castle (CCI)
summary: Crown Castle recently announced plans to sell its fiber division, appoint a new CEO, and highlighted improved carrier activity, which together are shaping the company’s evolving business strategy. This set of changes points to a shift toward becoming a pure-play U.S. tower company, signaling a potential reorientation of Crown Castle’s long-term operational priorities. We'll explore how the planned fiber division sale could influence Crown Castle's investment narrative and future growth...
